name: Spear Throwing Challange
description:
Join the Unity Ninja Discord!

Join the Unity Ninja Youtube Channel!

HOW TO PLAY

CLICK SPACE TO START RUNNING
-------- THEN --------
HOLD LEFT MOUSE BUTTON & CHOSE ROTATION ANGLE
-------- THEN --------
REALSE LEFT MOUSE BUTTON TO THROW SPEAR

1 SPEAR COST = 1 DOLLAR
